Text: Feel free to leave a comment.

I've been working on French subtitles for this movie, so far I've translated all of CD1. Expect a release in 2 days, or 3, if I'm lazy ^_^

Thanks a lot Heero14! I've downloaded a 4Gb version of the Bay two years ago but for the files became corrupted or something when I put it on my external HD. So, very happy with this upload, can't wait to see it again!
Awesome release, shame that the CCCP coded subs  don't work with a mac computer nor with XBMC, only with windows... :(

In October, my internet bandwith will become limited, so I won't be able to uplaod anymore. It's very frustrating, nothing I can do about it. Because of that, I will try to seed as much as I can until October arrives. Get it while you still can!
